supply.configuration.play_sound.tooltip: Plays a sound when an item is successfully supplied.
supply.configuration.supply_blocks.toolt:
Supplies any available block item.

Useful for building with mixed materials.
supply.configuration.supply_copies.toolt:
Supplies items that are exact copies.

Checks §7Data Components§f, §7Enchantments§f, and §7Durability§f.
supply.configuration.supply_food.tooltip:
Supplies any available food item after eating.

Only triggers if the player is currently hungry.
supply.configuration.supply_items.toolti:
Supplies items that are the same.

Ignores §7Data Components§f, §7Enchantments§f, and §7Durability§f.
supply.configuration.supply_loyalty.tool:
Supplies items with the §7Loyalty§f enchantment.

Disable to wait for the item to return, while still allowing refill on manual drop.
supply.configuration.supply_offhand.tool:
Supplies items to the §7Offhand§f slot.

Useful for §7Shields§f, §7Torches§f, or §7Food§f.
supply.configuration.supply_on_change.to: Supplies when the item type changes (e.g., tool breaks).
supply.configuration.supply_on_drop.tool:
Supplies after dropping an item.

Disable to prevent accidental refills while clearing inventory.
supply.configuration.supply_throwables.t:
Supplies items in the §6supply:throwables§f tag (e.g., §7Eggs§f or §7Snowballs§f).

Disable to prevent supply on throw, while still allowing refill on manual drop.
supply.configuration.title: §lSupply
